item.title: Sweep (YC S23) is hiring to build autocomplete for JetBrains
item.description:
We’re building an AI coding assistant for JetBrains IDEs. com/JetBrains/intellij-platform-plugin-template and build something like GitHub Copilot autocomplete for JetBrains. Sweep is the best enterprise AI coding assistant for JetBrains IDEs.

HN Discussion

Read Original Article

item.title: Video games can alter reality
item.description:
“We do see that those with previous diagnoses are more susceptible to experience game transfer phenomena, and those tend to have it more intensely,” says Angelica. He started compulsively taking showers,” says Angelica. 0/Wikimedia Commons Some have even labelled Tetris a cognitive vaccine for PTSD.

HN Discussion

Read Original Article

Top 1 Comments:

dudefeliciano:

From what I understand the tetris effect is not caused by the video game itself, but by playing it for an inordinate amount of time. The "tetris effect" has been there way before tetris, any monotonous activity done for an excessive amount of time will cause a tetris effect (i think a lot of people are familiar with hypnogenic hallucinations while falling asleep after driving all day, for example).
